client.proxy

Class GamesProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.proxy.GamesProxy

  • public class GamesProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle a majority of the higher level game functions: save, join, load, create, list

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamesProxy(Proxy proxy)
      Initialize the HttpProxy

    • Method Summary

      Sends a request to server and creates a game

      java.util.List<GameInfo> list()
      Sends a request to the server and gets all games running on server
      int load(LoadGameRequest request)
      Loads a previously saved game file This is for debug purposes only

      Saves the game for debugging purposes.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        int
        Pre Conditions:;

        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:

        Pre Conditions:;

        Post Conditions:

      • save

        public int save(SaveGameRequest request)
        Saves the game for debugging purposes. Allows the dev to reinstate the game from the buggy state
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        int
        Pre Conditions:;
        takes a SaveGameRequest {id (int), name (string)}
        Post Conditions:
        returns a -1 if failed and a 1 if successful
